briefdescription.para: Output Data published at the end of cycle.
HMC5883 Driver Application (HMC5883) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: HMC5883 Driver Application Task application entry point. This function performs app initialization, then waits for the cFE ES Startup Sync, then executes the main processing loop.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the HMC5883 Driver Application (HMC5883) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: HMC5883 Driver Application application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize (or restore from CDS) HMC5883 data structures and get the application registered with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the HMC5883 application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by HMC5883 application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the HMC5883 application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the HMC5883 application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Receive and process messages from the scheduler pipe.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function receives and processes messages for the HMC5883 application from the SCH pipe. This function will pend for the type defined by iBlocking, allowing it to wait for messages, i.e. wakeup messages from scheduler.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

briefdescription.para: HMC5883 Driver Application Task incoming command processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming commands subscribed by HMC5883 application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: HMC5883 Driver Application Task application commands.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes command messages specific to the HMC5883 application

simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message

for valid, FALSE for invalid.

briefdescription.para: Update parameters from the configuration table.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function updates the current paramamters from the currently loaded configuration table.

simplesect.para: Updates the sensor calibration table with passed values.

simplesect.para: This function manages the configuration tables and obtains a pointer to their data.
